api_list.name: getTransaction
api_list.description: get the transaction detail by transaction hash

api_list.name: nativeBalance
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://web3-api2.p.rapidapi.com/nativeBalance/0x4e34e388eA82c2374dAF6761Fab2dce28d9C8872"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web3-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://web3-api2.p.rapidapi.com/nativeBalance/{address}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "web3-api2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
